00030 using namespace std;
00031 #include<string>
00032 
00033 const double MEDIAN_CORRECTION = 0.5;
00034                                 // fudge factor to guarantee that medians
00035                                 // of even sets are sorted correctly wrt
00036                                 // those of odd sets (anything less than 1
00037                                 // will do)
00038 
00039 const string TREATMENT_PREFIX = "_tr";
00040                                 // what comes right before the treatment
00041                                 // number in the output file name
00042 const int TREATMENT_FIELD_WIDTH = 4;
00043                                 // length of field in which to embed
00044                                 // treatment number when it's appended to
00045                                 // the graph name
00046 const string ORD_SUFFIX = ".ord";
00047                                 // suffix for ordering files
00048 
00049 const int NAME_LENGTH = 511;    // maximum length of a node name
00050 const int LINE_LENGTH = 75;     // maximum length of a line in a .ord file
00051 
00052 extern bool TRUE_MEDIAN;        // true if you take average of two middle
00053                                 // elements when taking median of an even
00054                                 // number (only true for TR24)
